mapper.select: SELECT T1.ALIVEID as alive_aliveid, T1.ALIVETYPE as alive_alivetype, T1.ALIVEINTERVAL as alive_aliveinterval, T1.RELATEDID as alive_relatedid, T1.RELATEDNAME as alive_relatedname, T1.RELATEDSTATETAG as alive_relatedstatetag, T1.PARENTALIVEID as alive_parentaliveid, T2.ALIVEID as dependent_aliveid FROM ALIVETIMER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ALIVETIMER T2 ON T1.ALIVEID = T2.PARENTALIVEID

SELECT T1.ALIVEID as alive_aliveid, T1.ALIVETYPE as alive_alivetype, T1.ALIVEINTERVAL as alive_aliveinterval, T1.RELATEDID as alive_relatedid, T1.RELATEDNAME as alive_relatedname, T1.RELATEDSTATETAG as alive_relatedstatetag, T1.PARENTALIVEID as alive_parentaliveid, T2.ALIVEID as dependent_aliveid FROM ALIVETIMER T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ALIVETIMER T2 ON T1.ALIVEID = T2.PARENTALIVEID WHERE T1.ALIVEID = #{id}
